logentry.msg: [#10511] Remove or replace with throwing exception, exit_error() in tracker.php.

logentry.msg: [#5504] Replace Exception thrown by ArtifactType::fetchData() with DatabaseException and NotFoundException.
logentry.author: semtlnori

logentry.msg: [#11170] Use isAllowed() to check anonymous permission, instead of AritfactType::allowsAnon().
logentry.author: semtlnori

logentry.msg: [#10511] Replace exit_error() with throwing exception in update_monitor()
logentry.author: semtlnori

logentry.msg:
merged from trunk/nforge to 3.0-access-control
* r4023: [#5504] While deleting a member, throw DatabaseException when an error occurs in database and log only when there is no record matched by given $user_id in user_group table.
logentry.author: semtlnori

logentry.msg:
[#11172] upgrade script for new access control.
[#11173] Acl can convert * legacy role data to new role data * new role data to legacy role data And also read both of them from database.
[#11175] Role Editor stores role data in * new Access Control format and read role data in both of * new Access Control format * legacy format
logentry.author: semtlnori
